java/liquibase/change/InsertDataChange.java

00001 package liquibase.change;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.Database;
00004 import liquibase.database.sql.InsertStatement;
00005 import liquibase.database.sql.SqlStatement;
00006 import liquibase.database.structure.DatabaseObject;
00007 import liquibase.database.structure.Table;
00008 import liquibase.exception.UnsupportedChangeException;
00009 import org.w3c.dom.Document;
00010 import org.w3c.dom.Element;
00011 
00012 import java.util.*;
00013 
00017 public class InsertDataChange extends AbstractChange {
00018 
00019     private String schemaName;
00020     private String tableName;
00021     private List<ColumnConfig> columns;
00022 
00023     public InsertDataChange() {
00024         super("insert", "Insert Row");
00025         columns = new ArrayList<ColumnConfig>();
00026     }
00027 
00028     public String getSchemaName() {
00029         return schemaName;
00030     }
00031 
00032     public void setSchemaName(String schemaName) {
00033         this.schemaName = schemaName;
00034     }
00035 
00036     public String getTableName() {
00037         return tableName;
00038     }
00039 
00040     public void setTableName(String tableName) {
00041         this.tableName = tableName;
00042     }
00043 
00044     public List<ColumnConfig> getColumns() {
00045         return columns;
00046     }
00047 
00048     public void setColumns(List<ColumnConfig> columns) {
00049         this.columns = columns;
00050     }
00051 
00052     public void addColumn(ColumnConfig column) {
00053         columns.add(column);
00054     }
00055 
00056     public void removeColumn(ColumnConfig column) {
00057         columns.remove(column);
00058     }
00059 
00060     public SqlStatement[] generateStatements(Database database) throws UnsupportedChangeException {
00061 
00062         InsertStatement statement = new InsertStatement(getSchemaName() == null?database.getDefaultSchemaName():getSchemaName(), getTableName());
00063 
00064         for (ColumnConfig column : columns) {
00065             statement.addColumnValue(column.getName(), column.getValueObject());
00066         }
00067 
00068         return new SqlStatement[]{
00069                 statement
00070         };
00071     }
00072 
00073     public String getConfirmationMessage() {
00074         return "New row inserted into " + getTableName();
00075     }
00076 
00077     public Element createNode(Document currentChangeLogFileDOM) {
00078         Element node = currentChangeLogFileDOM.createElement("insert");
00079         if (getSchemaName() != null) {
00080             node.setAttribute("schemaName", getSchemaName());
00081         }
00082 
00083         node.setAttribute("tableName", getTableName());
00084 
00085         for (ColumnConfig col : getColumns()) {
00086             Element subNode = col.createNode(currentChangeLogFileDOM);
00087             node.appendChild(subNode);
00088         }
00089         return node;
00090     }
00091 
00092     public Set<DatabaseObject> getAffectedDatabaseObjects() {
00093         Table dbObject = new Table(getTableName());
00094 
00095         return new HashSet<DatabaseObject>(Arrays.asList(dbObject));
00096     }
00097 
00098 }
